title: Bug 17703 - EditAdd Task action should use Workbench dialog as Java Editor does
OB: When you press F1 and select a CU in the packages view and execute the 'File' -> 'Add Task' action, observe that you get a different dialog than when executing the action from the Java editor's ruler context menu.
EB: The 'Edit' -> 'Add Task' action should use the same Workbench dialog as the Java Editor does for consistency.
